ProductInfo.Features:
Swann's TruBlue blue-lit 960H DVR with real time, widescreen high resolution live video viewing & playback, perfect for 16:9 monitors
Includes 4 x high resolution 650 cameras with powerful night vision
Set & forget by recording continuously from 4 channels for 30 days+ onto a 500GB hard drive, even longer with motion detection for extra capacity connect external hard drive to eSATA port
Save time & have peace of mind by easily locating incident video, then transfer to external storage via USB or network
ProductInfo.Name: Swann SWDVK-432004-US Swann 3200 4 CH DVR and 4 x 650 TVL Cameras (Black)
